title: I updated to Android Q beta last week and because of that support and tips option of settings not wo
content:
Since i updated Android beta Q tips and support option of settings not works in my phone and setting app crashes after i click on tips and support option. And from few last days charger is not working fine in my particular pixel 2xl bt it works on other devices which support type c charging.
And i am not able to call or ask for any help from google pixel support because tha tips and support option of phone settings make settings crash after i click onto support option.
Please help me and i how can i contact to google pixel support and can anyone provide me google pixel helpline mobile number
